title: Looking to buy T202 Tinker, Evers, Chance
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Looking to buy T202 Tinker, Evers, Chance
posts.post_content:
Am looking for a graded T202 Tinkers, Evers, Chance triple folder card, maybe grade 2-4…. Open to raw if you’re a long timer here with references and would be willing to buy it back if it didn’t get a numerical grade.

Thx for any leads!

Jeff
